short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clip and save everything you care about.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Clipix Browser Extension is a powerful tool to save and organize everything you care about. Keep it private or share with friends.

Save anything you find online: websites, articles, and even videos, and organize it all onto clipboards. 
When you’re shopping, save products and set Price Drop Alerts to save money on all the items you want to buy. 
Choose an image or capture your screen (select a specific part of the page or the entire screen—the choice is yours). 
Save photos and documents from your computer including; PDFs, Word Documents and Excel files.

Easily scroll through your most recently added clips, and receive and view Clipix notifications on the fly. You can access your clips from any computer, mobile browser or with the free Clipix apps for iPhone and Android!
